page.title: 09BASILDON NE: SCHOOL DAYS
page.content: Well, I go to junior school at quarter to nine and I go in and then the bell goes. I start work. I usually begin with mathematics, and later in the morning I either write a story or do some other English. In the afternoon I do topic work, when I work on something which interests me. One topic has been about a river and the things that are found by it, the villages and the industries. Another has been about clothes and the way they have changed. My favourite work is about animals, usually birds and the other small creatures we can find around us. I enjoy being in my class, but some things in school I don't like. Assemblies can be boring - don't do this, don't do that - and I don't like Christmas time because the whole school has to do plays.
